attributes: Acquire 10 additional points of credit tokens in any combination of colors
name: Written record

attributes: In conflicts, you may choose to remove tokens from areas adjacent by land. After each round of token removal a new check for token majority must be made. You may decide to wait for other token conflicts to be resolved first.
You are allowed to cause conflict in areas containing units belonging to players holding Cultural Ascendancy.
name: Advanced Military

attributes: The population limit of ‘0’, ‘1’ and ‘2’ areas on the board is increased by 1 for you as long as these areas do not contain any other player’s units or barbarian tokens.
FAMINE: If you are the primary victim, take 5 additional damage.
name: Agriculture
